document_data.mainbody:
Klarinthra Larntrout was an elven winemaker who lived in the 11 century DR.
Klarinthra Larntrout was renowned for making a strong type of mushroom wine using morels and mint as main ingredients. The tipple was the Simbuls favorite alcoholic beverage. Klarinthra was also a good friend of Elminster Aumar until her death in the 11 century DR. Following her death, the Simbul was searching for a new drink that could come close to Klarinthras recipe in taste and potency.
